description: Cemu is a program that allows you to play Wii U games in Windows. In Cemu you can load an RPX file to play a Wii U game. Select File → Load and navigate to the location of your RPX file. The file is located in the "code" folder of the game directory. An example directory is cemu_1.7.0\​Mario Kart 8\​code .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .rpx file in GrapeCity ActiveReports 13
images.caption: RPX file open in GrapeCity ActiveReports 13
